1.「元ポツコン２号じゃねえですかッ！| いいところに 来ましたッ！| ちょっと こ: Isn't that former Potsucon No. 2? You've|come to the right place! Hey, look at this|guy!

2.「こいつは あの遺跡で拾ってきた| 魔神兵とかいうガラクタの 一部なんですがね。: This is a piece of junk I picked up at the|ruins. If you sit here like this...

3.「イタタタッ！ 見てくだせえッ！| とがった部分が しりっぺたの先に当たって……: Ouch! Look at this! The pointy part hits the|tip of my... my flipper. Ouch! That's why!

4.「ここにある たいがいのもんは| イスぐらいには なりますが| こいつは イスに: Most of these things can be used as chairs,|but this one can't even be used as a chair.

5.「こりゃ正真正銘の ガラクタでごぜえますよッ！| こんな すばらしい物に めぐり: This is a genuine piece of junk! I am the|happiest man in the world to have come|across such a wonderful thing!

8.「わわっ！ ダ ダストンさまっ！| こいつ ガラクタのくせに しゃべってますよ！: Whoa! Oh, Duston! He's talking, even though|he's a piece of junk!

9.「エネルギー限界。| 凍眠室 内部 危険。凍眠室 内部 危険……。: Energies. Inside the cryo-sleep chamber.|Inside the cryo-sleep chamber Danger.

11.「さ さすがの わしでも| 死体は 勘弁でごぜえますよ……？: I'm afraid that even I, as you can imagine,|would not like to see a dead body...?

14.「……ほほう。ウルベアの魔の手より| 余を救ってくれたのは そちたちじゃな。|: .... It was you guys who saved me from the|clutches of Urbaea. Suffer. Praise me.

15.「い いきなり出てきて エラそうに……。| アンタ いったい 何者でごぜえますか: He just came out of nowhere and looked like|an asshole. Who the hell are you?

16.「これは 異なことを……。| ドワーフでありながら 余を知らぬとな？| ……まあ: This is a strange thing to do. You're a|dwarf and you don't know me? ... Well. I'm|generous.

17.「ならば 我が名を聞いて おそれおののくのだ！| 余は かのガテリア皇国の 正統: Then hear my name and be terrified! I am|Byang Dao, first prince of the Kingdom of|Gateria, the rightful heir to the throne!

19.「あ…あまり反応が ないな。| ……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。: Oh... Not much of a reaction. ... Well...|I'm generous.

20.「おおっ！ そうじゃッ！| こうしては おれん！| 囚われの リウ老師を救わねば: Oh! Yes! No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,|no, no, no, no, no! We must save Master Liu|from captivity!

21.「そち！ 奇妙な身なりをしているものの| なかなか ウデが立つと見たぞよ。| 余: There you are! Despite his strange|appearance, he appears to be quite skilled.|Do me a favor.

22.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 余: As a matter of fact, in the Underground|Empire of Urbaea, a man named Liu, my tutor,|is a prisoner just like me.

23.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてくれ:
So, will you help me lead the men to the|Underground Empire of Urbaea and rescue|Maester Liu? Of course, you'll get your|
|reward!

24.「うむ！ 苦しゅうない！| そち 名は なんと申す？| ……そうか <pc>と申: Mm! No pain! What is your name? ... I see...|<pc> and...

25.「それでは <pc>よ！| 反重力飛行装置を 持ってまいれ！| ウルベアまで ひ: Then, <pc>! Grab your anti-|gravity flight gear and get moving! Let's|make a quick run for Urbea!

27.「……コホン。どうした？| 反重力飛行装置を 知らぬわけではあるまい？| ほれ: .... What's up? You're not familiar with|anti-gravity flight devices, are you? Here,|fly around freely in the sky.

28.「まさか……！| ここには 反重力飛行装置がないと申すか！？<yesno><cl: No way. You mean to tell me that there is no|anti-gravity flight device here?<yesno><close>

29.「ちょっと 元ポツコン２号さん！| この部屋にあるのは ガラクタだけで| そんな: Hey, ex-PotCon II! All we have in this room|is a bunch of junk, and I don't see how any|of that stuff is useful!

30.「言われてみれば 確かに……。| ここにいる者の身なりは 相当 貧相……。| こ: If you ask me, it's true. The people here|are quite poorly dressed. This is a favela.

31.「すまぬ。余の配慮が 足りなかったわ。| ならば いたしかたなし。| 地下帝国ま: . I didn't think enough of it. Then so be|it. We'll go on foot to the Underground|Empire.

32.「それでは <pc>よ。| ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。| 余は そちの後: Now, <pc>, you will lead us to|the Underground Empire of Urbaea. I will|follow you.

33.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。| 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋に:
When you get to Urbea, go to the basement.|Master Liu is being held prisoner in a room|in the back, around the third basement|
|level.

34.「……ムムッ！| そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており| 余の頼みは 受: ... Mwah! I'm afraid you have too many|requests from the lower ranks to do me any|favors.

35.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: ... Well... I'm generous. Nevertheless, we|do not have a moment to lose. You'll help me|with this as soon as you can.

36.「なんと！ 余の頼みを 断ると申すか！| 我がガテリア皇国の威光を| おそれぬ者: Oh, my God! You dare to refuse my request!|Who would not fear the might of my Kingdom|of Gateria?

37.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: ... Well... I'm generous. However, we do not|have a moment to lose. Come back if you|change your mind.

38.「おお 待っておったぞ！| ここにいる者に まともに話せる者はおらぬ。| 頼みの: Oh, I've been waiting for you! There's only|one person in this room who can speak|properly... You're the one I'm counting on.

39.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 余: As a matter of fact, in the Underground|Empire of Urbaea, a man named Liu, my tutor,|is a prisoner just like me.

40.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてくれ:
So, will you help me lead the men to the|Underground Empire of Urbaea and rescue|Maester Liu? Of course, you'll get your|
|reward!

41.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 囚: As a matter of fact, a man named Liu, my|tutor, is a prisoner in the Underground|Empire of Urbaea.

42.「そちには 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしても: You will lead me to the Underground Empire|of Urbaea and help me rescue Master Liu.

43.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。| 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋に:
When you get to Urbea, go to the basement.|Master Liu is being held prisoner in a room|in the back, around the third basement|
|level.

44.「反重力飛行装置がないのは| いささか不便じゃが いたしかたなし。| 地下帝国ま:
The lack of an anti-gravity flight device is|a bit of an inconvenience, but I'll take it.|We'll have to get to the Underground Empire|
|on foot.

45.「それでは <pc>よ。| ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。| 余は そちの後: Now, <pc>, you will lead us to|the Underground Empire of Urbaea. I'll|follow you.

46.「ハア ハア……。待ちや <pc>。| いったい どれほど 余を歩かせるのじゃ？: Haa, haa. Wait, <pc>, how long do|you want me to walk? I'm not used to|walking.

47.「ところで <pc>よ。| そちは 来る場所を まちがえておらぬか？: By the way, <pc>, are you coming|to the wrong place?

48.「進めども 進めども ガレキの山……。| 余の知っておる ウルベア地下帝国は|: On and on and on, a pile of rubble. The|Underground Empire of Urbea that I know is|not in ruins like this, is it?

49.「深く 広く 掘られた空洞には| 虹色に輝く宝石で 装飾された家屋が並び| 頭上:
Deep, wide cavities were excavated, lined|with houses decorated with rainbow-colored|jewels, and overhead, anti-gravity flying|
|machines.

50.「のう <pc>よ。| ここが その大陸随一の大国と うたわれた| ウルベア地下: You are telling me that this is the|Underground Empire of Urbaea, which is said|to be the greatest power on the continent!<yesno><close>

51.「ならば なぜ かような場所に| 余を 連れてきた！| 連れてきたには それなり: Then why did you bring me to such a place!|You brought me here for a good reason!

52.「これは異なことを……。余は 信じられぬ。| あの 栄華を誇った地下帝国が| な: This is a strange thing. I believe... Why|does that glorious underground empire look|like this?

53.<pc>は ビャン・ダオに|この場所が ウルベア地下帝国の|遺跡であることを伝え: The <pc> tells Bian Dao that|this place is the ruins of the Urbea|Underground Empire.

54.「なん…じゃと……！？| ここは ウルベア地下帝国の遺跡じゃと？| 遺跡というこ: What the... What...! This place is the ruins|of the Underground Empire of Urbaea? Ruins,|which means...

55.「ウルベアは すでに滅んで……| このありさまに……。: Urbea has already perished... And here we|are.

56.「なんということじゃ……。| 余は…… 余は かの帝国が滅びるまで| 魔神兵の中: Oh, my God. I'm... I slept among the Demon|Soldiers until the end of the empire?

57.「な ならば ガテリアは どうじゃ！？| <pc>よ！ そちは ガテリア皇国の|: Well, then, how about the gateria?|<pc>! Do you know what will|happen to the Kingdom of Gateria?<yesno><close>

58.「おおっ！ 知っておると申すか！| ならば 余に 話してみい！| ガテリアは 今: Oh! You know what I'm talking about! Then|tell me! What is happening to Gateria now?

59.「…………………………。| 何も 答えられぬではないか。| クチから出まかせを: . You have no answer. Don't talk out of your|ass!

60.「……そうか。何も 知らぬのじゃな。| すなわち ガテリアも ウルベア同様| も: .... I don't know anything. I mean, Gateria,|like Urbaea, is no longer in the area.

62.「……すまぬ。一国の皇子である 余が| 情けない姿を さらしてしもうた……。|: .... I, a prince of a country, have been|exposed in a shameful manner. Forgive me,|<pc>.

63.「だが そちの話を聞いて| あらゆることに 合点がいったわ。: But after listening to you, I agree with|everything you've said.

65.「すべて 時の流れの中で| 我らの文明が 失われてしまったため……。: All because in the course of time our|civilization was lost.

66.「……つまりは グルヤンラシュ！| きゃつの思い通りになったということか……！: ... In other words, Guliyanlalash! You mean|you got what you wanted...!

67.「……<pc> そちに聞かせたい話がある。| 余が この時代に来る前の話じゃ……: ... ... <pc> The story I want|you to hear. It was before my time.

68.「かつて この大陸には ふたつの大国があった。| 余が 国王となるはずだった ガ: There were once two great powers on this|continent. I was to be king of Gateri. And|here, in the depths of Urbea.

69.「ふたつの国は 他の種族を圧倒する技術力を有し| そこに住まう者たちは なに不自:
The two countries have a technological|superiority over other species, and their|inhabitants enjoy a life of peace and|
|tranquility.

71.「グルヤンラシュは 高潔な神官の身なりで現れ| ウルベア皇帝に取り入ると| ふた:
Guryanrash appeared in the guise of a|virtuous priest and took up with Emperor|Urbea, forcing the two great powers to fight|
|each other.

72.「その戦いの中 多くの技術者が散り| たがいの技術と技術が ぶつかり合って| 我:
In the course of the battle, many engineers|were scattered, and our civilization was|gradually lost as technologies clashed with|
|each other.

73.「……そう！ 我らの文明の喪失は| すべて グルヤンラシュの奸計によるもの！|:
... Yes! The loss of our civilization was|all due to the wiles of Guryan Rush! The|hatred between the two countries has led to|
|their destruction!

74.「……そして 行き過ぎた 戦いの果てに| 余は 命の危険に さらされた。| それ: ... And I was in mortal danger from a fight|that went too far. Master Liu saved me.

75.「父上も母上も もう生きては いまい。| じゃが リウ老師だけは| 今も どこか: Father and mother are no longer alive. But|Master Liu is still alive somewhere.

76.「老師は 余が この時代に来る前に| 余の後を追って 魔神兵に乗ると| 約束して: The old master promised that he would follow|me and ride the Demon Soldier before I came|to this time.

77.「じゃが ここに老師は いない様子……。| 余は ひとまず あのガラクタ屋敷に戻: But I don't see the Maester here. I'll go|back to the junk house for now and think|about the future.

78.「<pc>よ これは ほうびじゃ。| この時代に価値があるかは わからぬが| あ: <pc>. I don't know if it's|worth it in this day and age, but thank you.

79.「<pc>……。| そちは 信頼に値する者だと わかった。| 余が 困ったときは: <pc>. You are worthy of our|trust. If I'm ever in trouble, you can help|me again.

80.「リウ老師……。| そなたは どこへ行ったのだ？| 余を 時の激流に 押しやった: Master Liu. Where did you go? Leaving me to|be swept away in the torrent of time.
